options.content:
This dashobard provide metrics (mainly count and volume) exposed by LTA

Note: For CloudFerro we are waiting for them exposing of their metrics

The information displayed was originally taken from Metrics at LTA  

Time reference for this dashboard is : timestamp

Important notice : Tables & timelines can only display up to 10 000 entries. Please make use of filters to narrow down the retrieved data and get a more realistic view.

targets.query:
satellite_unit : $satellite AND 
mission: $mission AND 
production_service_name: $lta AND 
metric_name: download AND
metric_sub_type : "size"
